source: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_SEQ_01<tab>Mogeuge tells you how the elder wyverns have been amassing their forces below his lookout spot in preparation for an all-out attack. His nerves frayed by the constant vigilance required of his position, he begs your assistance to delay the wyverns' plans. Drop down to the Four Arms and slay four elder wyverns, buying Mogeuge some time to rest his weary mind.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_SEQ_01<tab>Mogeuge vous a parlé des <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF20E2C0302 /var> qui se réunissaient à l'est du passe-nuage d'Asah et qui semblaient préparer un mauvais coup. Il vous a demandé de donner une leçon à quatre d'entre elles pour les tenir en respect.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_SEQ_02<tab>You slay the requisite number of elder wyverns, thereby postponing their attack. Return to the top of the Asah ruins and report your success to Mogeuge.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez rempli la mission que Mogeuge vous avait confiée. Allez lui faire votre rapport.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_SEQ_03<tab>Mogeuge is relieved to hear that you have thinned the elder wyverns' ranks. The moogle has been in constant fear of the dragons ever since Nidhogg's roar drove them into a frenzy. However, your kind assistance has bought the fraught moogle a few hours of rest and relaxation.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_SEQ_03<tab>Mogeuge vous a remercié<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> et vous a avoué son angoisse face à la récente agressivité des disciples de Nidhogg.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_MOGEUGE_000_000<tab>Elder wyverns here, elder wyverns there...elder wyverns everywhere! I know they're planning something, but what? I've been watching them for days, just waiting for the moment that they launch their attack. I'm so tired, kupo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_MOGEUGE_000_000<tab>Depuis quelque temps, des <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF20E2C0302 /var> se réunissent à l'est d'ici. Je sens qu'elles manigancent un mauvais coup, alors je les tiens à l'œil, mais je commence à fatiguer, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_MOGEUGE_000_001<tab>Could I ask a really big favor of you, adventurer? Get rid of them for me! It doesn't have to be all of them, kupo─just four or so. That would make them think twice about doing whatever it is they're doing...or at least delay them long enough for me to get some rest, kupo.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_MOGEUGE_000_001<tab>Est-ce que vous pourriez donner une bonne leçon à quelques-unes d'entre elles pour leur montrer qu'elles n'ont pas intérêt à venir nous attaquer<var 1D /var>? Quatre devraient suffire, kuppo.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_MOGEUGE_000_010<tab>Please, adventurer! It isn't good for my nerves, just floating here, waiting for the wyverns to attack! If you could get rid of four of them for me, I could finally relax a little, kupo... Maybe have a bit of a nap...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_MOGEUGE_000_010<tab>Donnez une leçon à quatre de ces <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF20E2C0302 /var> qui se réunissent à l'est d'ici pour leur montrer qu'elles feraient mieux de garder leurs distances, kuppo.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_MOGEUGE_000_020<tab>Thank you, kupo! Now that you've reduced their numbers, those wyverns won't be attacking any time soon! I can finally relax...for an hour or two, anyway.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_MOGEUGE_000_020<tab>Merci, kuppo<var 1D /var>! Vous avez dû faire passer l'envie de nous attaquer à ces <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF20E2C0302 /var>. En tout cas, ça me rassure un peu de savoir qu'il y en a moins, kuppo.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_MOGEUGE_000_021<tab>It's all that dread wyrm's fault─ever since he roared, the dragons have flown into a wild rage, attacking anything they set their eyes on. They're so scary, kupo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ508_01843_MOGEUGE_000_021<tab>Depuis que Nidhogg a poussé son hurlement, les dragons qui lui obéissent sont devenus très agressifs. On vit dans l'angoisse permanente, kuppo...
